title: Special license plates; alternative fueled vehicles to include hybrid vehicles; allow for issuance

abstracts.abstract: A BILL to be entitled an Act to amend Code Section 40-2-86.1 of the Official Code of Georgia Annotated, relating to special license plates promoting or supporting certain worthy agencies, funds, or nonprofit corporations and qualified motor vehicles or drivers with proceeds deposited into the general fund, so as to allow for the issuance of the special license plate for alternative fueled vehicles to include hybrid vehicles; to provide for definitions; to provide for the compilation and submission of a report on the issuance of such special plates to hybrid vehicles; to provide for related matters; to repeal conflicting laws; and for other purposes.
